page.title: 06STANLEY COMMON----S.LEE
page.content: I HAVE LIVED IN STANLEY COMMON FOR OVER A YEAR.I LIVE ON THE CRESCENT. THE VILLAGE IS LIKE A SMALL TREE WITH A MAIN ROAD AND LOTS OF LITTLE ONES SPROUTING OFF. THE VILLAGE HAS 2 OFF-LICENCES.ONE IS CALLED THE 'TOP SHOP'AND THE OTHER IS KNOWN IN THE VILLAGE AS PEGGY'S.THE POST OFFICE HAS NO NAME.AS WELL AS SELLING STAMPS AND ENVELOPES IT ALSO SELLS A BIT OF HARDWARE.THE NEWSAGENTS IS NEXT TO THE POST OFFICE AND IS CALLED D,W AND E THOMSON.IT IS OWNED BY THE PARENTS OF A GIRL IN MY CLASS. THE BUTCHER IS FURTHER DOWN THE ROAD. IT IS CALLED GEORGE STAFFORD'S.THE CHIPPY IS NEXT TO THE BUTCHERS AND I CALLED 'THE JOLLY FRIAR. THE BAKER IS MUCH FURTHER DOWN THE ROAD AND IS CALLED THE DENVER BAKERY. {CONTINUED ON PAGE 7
